OrgName.entry: ST PAULS GOOD NEIGHBOURS COMMUNITY BASE

Desc.entry: Community base serving the New Parson Cross community, shared by various projects, including: Good Neighbours Team, which specifically works to support people aged 50 years and over (see separate entry), a drop-in/coffee morning and a Credit Union collection point.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Monday morning (drop-in/coffee morning & credit union collection point)

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 5
